text:
Sean Hayes Will Lead THE UNKNOWN Off-Broadway

November 17, 2025



Tony, Emmy & SAG Award winning actor Sean Hayes will return to the New York stage in THE UNKNOWN, a new one-man play by playwright David Cale, directed by Tony Award nominee Leigh Silverman. (more...)

Watch the First Teaser Trailer for Disney's Live-Action MOANA

November 17, 2025



Disney has dropped the first teaser for Moana, the live-action reimagining of the 2016 animated hit coming to theaters in 2026. Watch to teaser to see the beloved animated world come to life in live-action and to hear a first listen to 'How Far I'll Go' performed by Catherine Lagaʻaia. (more...)

Jim Barne and Kit Buchan Break Down the Music of TWO STRANGERS...

November 15, 2025



We continue Notes on a Score with Jim Barne and Kit Buchan, who make their Broadway debuts this season with the already viral Two Strangers (Carry a Cake Across New York). Watch in this video as they unpack the Act 1 closer, 'American Express.' (more...)

Kickstart Your Career on Stage and Screen with Atlantic Acting School

November 15, 2025



When it comes to shaping your acting skills, Atlantic Acting School is the place to be. The revered institution is a presenting sponsor of BroadwayWorld's Next On Stage: Season 6, granting two winners a scholarship to its Summer Teen Conservatory in 2026. Watch in this video as we catch up with Atlantic Acting School Executive Director Mary McCann. (more...)

Inside WICKED: FOR GOOD New York City Premiere

November 18, 2025



Join BroadwayWorld on the red carpet from the swankified Wicked: For Good New York City premiere, which streamed live on November 17, 2025 and marked the final stop of the press tour for the film. Watch video interviews with composer Stephen Schwartz, book writer Winnie Holzman, stars Michelle Yeoh and Bronwyn James, cinematographer Alice Brooks and more. (more...)

Watch the WICKED: FOR GOOD New York Premiere

November 17, 2025



Check out the footage from the swankified Wicked: For Good New York City premiere, which streamed live on November 17, 2025 and marked the final stop of the press tour for the film. Ariana Grande, Cynthia Erivo, Jonathan Bailey, Jeff Goldblum, Michelle Yeoh, Marissa Bode, and more were in attendance. (more...)

Patti LuPone Reacts to MASQUERADE, WICKED, & More on WATCH WHAT HAPPENS LIVE

November 14, 2025



On Thursday, Broadway legend Patti LuPone returned to Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen. During her visit, the three-time Tony winner reacted to a variety of pop culture happenings, including Wicked: For Good, Masquerade, Broadway's Stranger Things, and more. Watch videos from the episode now! (more...)

Kara Young Picks the Shows That Shaped Her

November 14, 2025



In this video, watch as two-time Tony Award winner Kara Young walks us through the aisles of the Drama Book Shop to tell us all about the plays that made her the artist she is today. Can you guess which classics she most adores? (more...)

CHESS Cast Takes Opening Night Bows

November 17, 2025



The first-ever Broadway revival of CHESS officially opened at Broadway’s Imperial Theatre last night, Sunday, November 16. Check out a video from curtain call, featuring Aaron Tveit, Lea Michele and Nicholas Christopher, here! (more...)

Corey J. Bradford, Matthew Patrick Quinn, & More in HERCULES on the Disney Destiny

November 17, 2025



On November 20, Disney Cruise Line's newest ship, the Disney Destiny, will set sail for its Maiden Voyage, featuring the world premiere of the Broadway-style musical adaptation of Disney's Hercules. Take a look at new video footage, featuring beloved songs like 'Go the Distance,' performed by Corey J. Bradford as the title character! (more...)

Meet the Company of MONTY PYTHON’S SPAMALOT Tour

November 18, 2025



The Tony Award-winning Best Musical Comedy Monty Python’s SPAMALOT is launching a North American Tour, and BroadwayWorld's Richard Ridge went behind the scenes with the cast to get a sneak peek! (more...)

Keanu Reeves and Alex Winter Talk WAITING FOR GODOT on CBS MORNINGS

November 14, 2025



Keanu Reeves and Alex Winter, currently starring in the Broadway revival of Waiting for Godot, recently spoke to CBS Mornings about the prolific play and their longtime friendship. Check out the interview now. (more...)

Freya Skye & Malachi Barton Reprise ZOMBIES Characters in 'Snow Angels'

November 14, 2025



Malachi Barton and Freya Skye are back as their ZOMBIES characters Victor and Nova in Snow Angels, a winter music video inspired by the Disney Channel Original Movie ZOMBIES 4: Dawn of the Vampires. Check it out now. (more...)

PBS Unveils Trailer for New Dick Van Dyke Documentary

November 13, 2025



In celebration of the centennial birthday of Dick Van Dyke, PBS is releasing a new documentary film chronicling the life and career of the Emmy, Tony and Grammy-winning star. Watch the trailer now. (more...)
title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW Video

meta_data.description: On last night's LATE LATE SHOW, music guest Fifth Harmony performed 'He Like That' for the Stage 56 audience. Later, James invites the women of Fifth Harmony to play a game of Flinch.

twitter.title: VIDEO: Fifth Harmony Perform, Play 'Flinch' on LATE LATE SHOW
twitter.description: On last night's LATE LATE SHOW, music guest Fifth Harmony performed 'He Like That' for the Stage 56 audience. Later, James invites the women of Fifth Harmony to play a game of Flinch.
